Package common

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.Utils
  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility functions

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Utils.IVCipher
      A class binding a Cipher to its iv
      static interface  Utils.NSAEFunction<T>
      An interface representing a function which throws a NoSuchAlgorithmException or NoSuchPaddingException
      static interface  Utils.TransformFunction<T>
      An interface representing a function which transforms its input

      • createCipher

        public static Utils.IVCipher createCipher​(int op,
                                          java.security.Key key)
                                   throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Creates a Cipher using the encryption mode specified in Constants.ENCRYPTION_MODE
        Parameters:
        op - the opmode to initialize the Cipher with
        key - the key to initialize the Cipher with
        Returns:
        An Utils.IVCipher that uses the encryption mode specified in Constants.ENCRYPTION_MODE initialized with the given opmode and key.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given key is invalid, or its keysize exceeds the maximum allowable keysize
        See Also:
        Cipher.init(int, java.security.Key)

      • createCipher

        public static Utils.IVCipher createCipher​(int op,
                                          java.security.Key key,
                                          byte[] iv)
                                   throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Creates a Cipher using the encryption mode specified in Constants.ENCRYPTION_MODE
        Parameters:
        op - the opmode to initialize the Cipher with
        key - the key to initialize the Cipher with
        iv - the iv to initialize the cipher with
        Returns:
        An Utils.IVCipher that uses the encryption mode specified in Constants.ENCRYPTION_MODE initialized with the given opmode and key.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given key is invalid, or its keysize exceeds the maximum allowable keysize
        See Also:
        Cipher.init(int, java.security.Key, java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec), IvParameterSpec

      • createPasswordKey

        public static javax.crypto.SecretKey createPasswordKey​(byte[] password)
        Creates a SecretKey from the given password using the PBE parameters defined in Constants
        Parameters:
        password - the password to generate the key from
        Returns:
        a PBE key based on the given password
        See Also:
        Constants.SECRET_KEY_FACTORY_ALGORITHM, Constants.PBE_KEY_SALT, Constants.PBE_KEY_ITERATION_COUNT, Constants.SECRET_KEY_LENGTH, PBEKeySpec

      • catchNoSuchAlgorithmException

        public static <T> T catchNoSuchAlgorithmException​(Utils.NSAEFunction<T> function)

        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type of the function
        Parameters:
        function - the function to preform
        Returns:
        the output of the inputted function

      • intToBytes

        Converts an integer to a byte array of length 4
        Parameters:
        x - the integer to convert
        Returns:
        a byte array of length four representing the given integer

      • bytesToInt

        public static int bytesToInt​(byte[] bytes)
                      throws java.nio.BufferOverflowException,
                             java.nio.BufferUnderflowException
        Converts a byte array of length 4 to an integer
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array to convert
        Returns:
        the integer representing the byte array
        Throws:
        java.nio.BufferOverflowException - if the given byte array contains more than four bytes
        java.nio.BufferUnderflowException - if the given byte array contains less than four bytes

      • countStringMatches

        public static int countStringMatches​(java.lang.String str,
                                     java.lang.String findStr,
                                     boolean quote,
                                     boolean matchCase)
        Counts the number of matches in the specified String
        Parameters:
        str - the string to search in
        findStr - a string specifying what to match
        quote - Should the findStr be matched as a literal string
        matchCase - Should the findStr only match specific case
        Returns:
        the number of matches in the specified String

                                         boolean condition,
                                         Utils.TransformFunction<T> function)
        Conditionally transforms the input based on a Utils.TransformFunction
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of variable which will be operated on
        Parameters:
        o - the value to conditionally transform
        condition - Should the value be transformed?
        function - a Utils.TransformFunction specifying the transformation
        Returns:
        the conditionally transformed input
